content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'En el extranjero':

content.stimulus_en: I (have) ________ been to London.
She (have) ________ seen that movie.
They (have) ________ visited Japan.
Have you ________ (be) to Paris?
He (have) ________ not traveled much.
We (have) ________ tried sushi.
I have been to many different countries.
They visited have the Grand Canyon.
Have you ever been to a professional football match?
He never has traveled abroad before.
We have tried many types of international food.
She seen has the Eiffel Tower.
